markdownRemark.html: For a project I had to implement an underline transition on text links. For single line transitions there are lot of examples where you set a background on a pseudo element. For multiline I had look a bit harder. I found this great example for multiline underline transitions. I tweaked it a bit so the animation flows from left to right. frontmatter.title: Multiline underline transition
frontmatter.spoiler: To create an underline transition on multiline text links, one solution is to use a pseudo element with a background. This can be further customized with tweaks to the animation flow. Here is an example using React and extending the MUI Link component.
